markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Burrow Elocutionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=26) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 44 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You recognize the chittering of ground creatures as its own peculiar language. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with animals that have a burrow Speed, such as badgers, ground squirrels, moles, and prairie dogs. The GM determines which animals count for this ability.

<title level="2">Burrow Elocutionist leads to...</title>
[Animal Elocutionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=32)
name: Burrow Elocutionist
